paper_keywords: (is an element of,is an element of Vq)-fuzzy t-filters
paper_abstract: On residuated lattices, the notion of (is an element of,is an element of Vq)-fuzzy t-filters is introduced and relative properties (e.g. Extension property, Triple of equivalent characteristics and Quotient characteristics) are uniformly covered by this simple general framework. The relations among (is an element of,is an element of Vq)-fuzzy t-filters are investigated.
paper_title: (is an element of,is an element of Vq)-fuzzy t-filters on residuated lattices
